title: Lotta Body Wrap Me Foaming Mousse with Coconut and Shea Oil, 7 Ounce (Including Professional Snap on Magnetic Rollers 6 piece & 2 Wide Tooth Styling Hair Comb Set) Foam Tools Kit, 9 Set
description: Lotta Body Wrap Me Foaming Mousse with Coconut and Shea Oil 7 Oz- Enriched with Coconut & Shea Oils, this formula deeply penetrates and hydrates hair, leaving hair soft and nourished with a brilliant shine. This fast drying foaming mousse leaves wraps soft and full of body. Can be used for wash and wear hair styles, defining curls, and taming frizz. Magnetic Hair Rollers with Clips (6 piece set)- Rollers are best for professional use at a salon or for styling hair at home. These hair rollers are ideal for smooth volume, waves and curls. The curlers are sturdy and stay in place easily when secured with the included roller clips. They are also vented to aid in fast hair drying. Each pack includes 6 purple rollers.Wide Tooth Rake Comb Hair Styling Comb Set- Large detangle hair comb. 10 long and 2 teeth. ***Bonus Extra wide teeth comb included.Designed for all hair types 100 Percent Money Back
